creator: abatko@cs.mcgill.ca
text:
The ScriptSock directive (of mod_cgid) is missing from the
Directive Index, whereas the mod_cgi directives are listed.

Please add ScriptSock and the corresponding link to mod_cgid.

This was actually an error in the XSLT we use to auto-generate the directive
index.  Thanks for pointing out the problem!
creator: slive@apache.org
